mapper.select: select file_id as "fileId", data_list_id as "dataListId", file_name as "fileName", name as "dataListName", visual_type as "visualType" from project_file p, files f, data_list d where p.project_id = #{projectId} and f.id::text = p.file_id and d.id::text = p.data_list_id order by p.id desc
mapper.delete: delete from project_file where project_id = #{projectId} and file_id = #{fileId} and data_list_id = #{dataListId}
